response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to me. After careful consideration and evaluation, I am extending this exclusive offer to you at a price of $750,000. This exceptional piece represents a significant investment, and I believe it could be a valuable addition to your collection or business. Please let me know if you would like to discuss further details or arrange a viewing. I look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 750000}
